creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: green silk print damask bodice with red, orange, green cross stitch, geometric; extension below waist; ties at PR side; neck edged in narrow strip of red embroidery; sleeves trimmed in bands of red and yellow bands, cross stitch band in pink, green, purple; bright green silk damask band; side slits; same design in back; edged in two separate layers; each constructed of fourteen tiny layers of folded, multicolored fabrics; blue lining with some prints
title: Jacket
